content: आवर्तिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Whirling or turning upon itself, returning; आब्रह्मभुवनाल्लोकाः पुनरावर्तिनोऽर्जुन <ls>Bg. 8. 16</ls>; कालांतरावर्ति <ls>H. 1. 207.</ls> {@--2@} Melting, mixing &c. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} (--र्ती) A horse having curls of hair on various parts of the body (considered as a sign of auspiciousness). --नी {@--1@} A whirlpool. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of a plant (अजशृंगी).
